questStart: I need three chickens for my farm!
Can you help me find them?
questPartiallyCompleted: Great progress! Keep looking for more chickens!
questFinished: Thank you! All the chickens are safe now!
questHints: Look for birds with a red comb

questStart: Oh look! A baby deer got separated from its mother!
Can you help me find it?
questFinished: Thank you! Now the baby deer can return to its mother!
questHints: Look for a brown deer in the grass
